product_name: CeraVeSkin Renewing Vitamin C Eye Cream
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCeraVe Skin Renewing Vitamin C Eye Cream is fast-absorbing, non-greasy, and clinically shown to reveal visibly healthier, smoother, brighter, and more even looking skin around the eyes.
details: DetailsBenefitsHydrating daily eye cream for visibly firmer and brighter looking under eyes.Provides antioxidant benefits and is clinically shown to reveal visibly healthier, smoother, brighter, and more even looking skin around the eyes.Product packaging helps prevent oxidization and maintain product performance.Key IngredientsEssential for healthy skin, Ceramides are found naturally in the skin and make up 50% of the lipids in the skin barrier. As you age, studies show that ceramide levels decrease.Caffeine helps visibly reduce under-eye puffiness.MVE Delivery Technology provides controlled long lasting continuous hydration.Formulated WithoutParabensFragranceItem 2625699How To UseApply CeraVe Skin Renewing Vitamin C Eye Cream after cleansing in the AM and/or PM.Dispense eye cream onto your ring finger and apply in small dots around the eye contour.Gently blend onto your entire eye area (under-eye area, crow's feet area, eyelid, and brow bone), using upward motions, until completely absorbed.Follow with a face serum (like CeraVe Skin Renewing Vitamin C Serum).Complete your routine with a daytime face moisturizer with SPF and nighttime face cream (like CeraVe Skin Renewing Day Cream and CeraVe Skin Renewing Night Cream).Tips:Can be used alone or under makeup.For best results use CeraVe Skin Renewing Vitamin C Eye Cream twice a day, in the morning and at night after cleansing, for visibly firmer and brighter looking under-eyes.Precautions: Avoid direct contact with eyes. If contact with eyes occurs, rinse thoroughly with water.IngredientsAqua / Water / Eau, Glycerin, Ascorbic Acid, Propanediol, Dimethicone, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Isostearate, Sodium Hydroxide, Glyceryl Stearate, Peg-100 Stearate, Panthenol, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Hydrogenated Jojoba Oil, Ceramide Np, Ceramide Ap, Ceramide Eop, Carbomer, Copernicia Cerifera Cera / Carnauba Wax / Cire De Carnauba, Cetearyl Glucoside, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Triethyl Citrate, Caffeine, Silica, Sodium Hyaluronate, Sodium Lauroyl Lactylate, Cholesterol, Phenoxyethanol, Tocopherol, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Hydroxyacetophenone, Citric Acid, Caprylyl Glycol, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Xanthan Gum, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Phytosphingosine, Polyacrylate Crosspolymer-6, Benzoic Acid.
how_to_use: Apply CeraVe Skin Renewing Vitamin C Eye Cream after cleansing in the AM and/or PM.Dispense eye cream onto your ring finger and apply in small dots around the eye contour.Gently blend onto your entire eye area (under-eye area, crow's feet area, eyelid, and brow bone), using upward motions, until completely absorbed.Follow with a face serum (like CeraVe Skin Renewing Vitamin C Serum).Complete your routine with a daytime face moisturizer with SPF and nighttime face cream (like CeraVe Skin Renewing Day Cream and CeraVe Skin Renewing Night Cream).Tips:Can be used alone or under makeup.For best results use CeraVe Skin Renewing Vitamin C Eye Cream twice a day, in the morning and at night after cleansing, for visibly firmer and brighter looking under-eyes.Precautions: Avoid direct contact with eyes. If contact with eyes occurs, rinse thoroughly with water.
ingredients: Copernicia Cerifera Cera / Carnauba Wax / Cire De Carnauba

reviews.headline: Bye Bye Fine Lines
reviews.comments: I received CeraVe Skin Renewing Eye Cream in exchange for an honest review. It's very easy to apply. Just a very small dab goes a long way. I've been using this CeraVe Eye Cream for a few weeks now. My fine lines are fading. The area around my eye feels very hydrated. It does leave a tacky feeling after using which is why I gave it 4 stars. But the outcome is well worth it! I will recommend it to my family and friends.

reviews.headline: Not sure I would buy again
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I got a chance to try the CeraVe vitamin c eye cream for my honest opinion. While I like that it goes on smooth and feels moisturizing with no noticeable smell. I don't think it did anything for my dark circles but did take away puffiness. My dark circles are heriditary so I've tried pretty much everything. Might work better on someone who just didn't get enough sleep.

reviews.headline: Light eye cream for sensitive skin
reviews.comments: Seems like a run-of-the-mill eye cream. I personally haven't seen any changes under my eyes from it. The formula seems to not be thick enough to my liking. But if you're looking for a very light eye cream, this can work for you. I will say o have mostly sensitive skin, and this didn't irritate me at all. Seems also like a pretty large eye cream, too, which is nice. A little goes a long way. I'm solidly in the middle on this one. I received this product complementary as part of a promotion.

reviews.headline: Hydrating but no change in dark circles yet
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] Initially I took pictures of my dark circles before and after using but I think the reality is this takes a bit of time to see a difference. I feel like this is very hydrating and feels nice under the eyes, but I haven't noticed any real change yet. For the price and convenience though, I think this is a good buy.

reviews.headline: Brighter under eyes
reviews.comments: This undereye cream by Cerave is made with 5% pure vitamin C to brighten and help with dark circles. The cream is lightweight and feels cooling and smooth. I was gifted this by Cerave for my review.

reviews.headline: Have not seen any benefit
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I've been using this for a couple of weeks now and I don't really see any benefit. Doesn't do anything for puffiness and not much for brightening. Absorbs fine, and my skin isn't very dry but it doesn't seem all that moisturizing. Little to no scent.

reviews.headline: Gentle hydrating Vitamin C eye cream
reviews.comments: I received this product for free in exchange for my honest review. First and foremost, CeraVe is a staple brand in my household especially their moisturizing cream, which my family loves. I'm glad that I get to try CeraVe Skin Renewing Vitamin C Eye Cream. Formulated with 3 essential ceramides and 5% pure vitamin C. This eye cream has a smooth, lightweight consistency that glides on easily with the applicator tip. I've been using it for about two weeks now, and I've already noticed my under-eyes looking brighter and more refreshed. I'm hopeful that with continued use, I'll see even greater results over time.

reviews.headline: Great addition to routine
reviews.comments: I received this product in exchange for my honest review. The skin renewing vitamin c eye cream is super absorbs perfectly into my skin. The texture is that of any other cream and has no scent. I use this nightly before my moisturizer and after a few weeks I can see a clear difference under my eyes. They look brighter and feel softer.

reviews.headline: It's moisturizing, but no noticeable changes after 3+ weeks
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I can feel that the area is moisturized. It feels good to apply and takes very little product to cover the entire eye area. However, I have been using this for about a month and have not noticed any changes. While it moisturizes and the texture is nice, it doesn't do anything that my regular moisturizer doesn't. Perhaps with continued use there will noticeable changes.

reviews.headline: Good lotion that lightens and de-puffs!
reviews.comments:
[I received this product in exchange for my honest review] Like with the last survey CereVe, my wife immediately took this lotion from me! This eye cream is one of a number of CereVe items in our house. Unlike other lotions that claim to De puff eyes, she really likes the fact that you can put makeup on top of this one. She also likes how smooth it is and not thick.

Just a FYI, this lotion does not have any aroma, which is not a bad thing.

reviews.headline: Great eye cream!
reviews.comments: I received this product in exchange for my honest review. Great texture. The lotion has a little of a chemical scent but doesn't bother me. It absorbs quickly and leaves skin around eyes feeling hydrated. No difference in brightness seen.

reviews.headline: A pretty good, affordable eye cream
reviews.comments:
[I received this product in exchange for my honest review] Overall, this eye cream seems to work well and not be very expensive. It does help with hydrating the skin around me eyes and minimizing dark circles and puffiness which is great, but it doesn't have a really thick and rich feel like I like for my eye cream at night - your mileage might vary!

The tube with its needle-like tip keeps the product sanitary without dispensing too much like a pump might. It makes it easy to get just the right amount.

If someone is looking for an affordable eye cream option, this is certainly a good choice.

reviews.headline: Feels moisturizing
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I got a chance to try the CeraVe vitamin c eye cream for my honest opinion. While I like that it goes on smooth and feels moisturizing with no noticeable smell. I don't think it did anything for my dark circles but did take away puffiness. My dark circles are heriditary so I've tried pretty much everything. Might work better on someone who just didn't get enough sleep.

reviews.headline: Nice product
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I'm glad I got this for free to test. It is too soon to tell if it works, but overall I am happy with the packaging and the quality of the product. It is a nice cream with no strong odors that is easy to apply. Good combination of active ingredients in it.

reviews.headline: Comfortable Eye cream !!
reviews.comments:
[I received this product in exchange for my honest review] 

This eye cream works great! It absorbs easily and is affordable. Great for everyday use as part of my skincare routine! It's super important to start using eye cream early ! This cream feels comfortable on as well.

reviews.headline: dark undereyes
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I've been using this consistently for about a couple of weeks and I have noticed a difference under my eyes. I have very dark circles and I feel like I can tell the difference.

reviews.headline: Simply Amazing
reviews.comments: Adding the CeraVe Vitamin C eye cream into my routine was so simple. It pairs so perfectly with my daily lotion! I love that it feels so soft and light on the skin. I also like that it didn't take forever to absorb like some products. It is a must try if you're needing some vitamin c eye cream.

reviews.headline: love
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] Overall, this is a great daily eye cream. It feels hydrating and moisturizing, and contains ingredients that should help. I dont know that I have seen any marked difference in my under eyes, but I do enjoy the way my skin feels after use.

reviews.headline: Brightening + Gentle
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I've been using the CeraVe Skin Renewing Vitamin C Eye Cream for a few weeks now and I'm impressed with how lightweight and hydrating it feels. The formula absorbs quickly without leaving any greasy residue, and I like that it has 5% pure vitamin C for brightening. I've noticed my under-eye area looking more awake and smoother, especially on mornings after little sleep. It layers well under makeup too, which is a huge plus. Definitely a solid option if you want a gentle but effective eye cream that also supports long-term skin health.

reviews.headline: A glow up for your eyes!
reviews.comments: I've been using the CeraVe Vitamin C Eye Cream for a couple of weeks now, and it's quickly become a favorite. The texture is light and silky, absorbing instantly without any greasy feel. My under-eyes already look brighter, and the area feels soft and hydrated all day. I also love that it's gentle, fragrance-free, and safe for sensitive skinâ€”no irritation at all. Simple, effective, and makes my eyes look refreshed and awake. I received this product for free in exchange for my honest review.

faceoff_positive.comments:
[I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I've been using the CeraVe Skin Renewing Vitamin C Eye Cream for a few weeks now, and I'm seriously impressed with the results. As someone with a busy lifestyle and some stubborn under-eye dark circles, I was hoping this product would help brighten and smooth my skinâ€”and it absolutely delivered!

The texture is lightweight and absorbs quickly without feeling greasy or heavy, which is a huge plus for me. It has a creamy consistency that feels soothing when applied, and it doesn't leave a sticky residue, making it perfect for both morning and nighttime use.

I noticed that my under-eye area felt more hydrated and looked brighter almost immediately. After consistent use, I've seen a noticeable reduction in puffiness and dark circles. My skin feels smoother, and the fine lines around my eyes appear less noticeable, which is exactly what I was hoping for. The inclusion of vitamin C really seems to help brighten the skin without irritating it.

Overall, I'm really happy with the CeraVe Skin Renewing Vitamin C Eye Cream. It has definitely improved the appearance of my under-eye area, giving it a more refreshed, youthful look. For the price point, it's a great addition to my skincare routine, and I would highly recommend it to anyone looking for an effective and affordable eye cream.
faceoff_positive.headline: A must have for bright and refreshed eyes!

faceoff_negative.comments: This eye cream is very gentle compared to others I've tried. It's not sticky or u comfortable at all. It glides in smooth and dries down pretty quickly. It absorbs well into the skin and doesn't leave you feeling greasy or tacky like other eye creams. It's a great day eye cream. A little goes a long way too. I made the mistake of using too much the first two times I tried it and after it dries it starts to peel off. So you want to use a very small amount of it. Which is a good thing because this tube will last you a very long time. There was no crazy strong scent to it either which is always a good thing. My under eyes did feel moisturized and nice but I don't think I've used it long enough to see a real difference in dark circles or fine lines. I don't have that many yet to begin with so maybe that's why. I'm sure it'll be useful soon lol
faceoff_negative.headline: Absorbs well, gentle and moisturizing
